duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for providing high-quality, quick service to customers by processing orders, quotes and assisting customers with product information before, during, and after a purchasing transaction.
Receive and ensure orders are entered accurately via phone or email by reviewing and verifying all material entered.
Comprehend and easily maneuver through various computer programs to process transactions and provide basic product information to customers.
Determine customer expectations and provide options for resolution to meet their needs.
Maintain specified pricing guidelines and obtain approvals from Management for any exceptions.
Generate new and repeat sales by providing product and technical information in a timely manner.
Increase sales and average order size by means of cross-selling, up-selling, and add-on sales.

Constantly demonstrate a positive attitude toward self and others by interacting effectively and maintaining a professional manner and positive attitude through verbal and written contacts with external and internal contacts.
Support local Customer Service teams and provide support for other teams when needed.
Regular attendance at work is an essential part of the job.
Supports supervisor with updates on work queue status, in regular intervals.
Supports new joiners or existing team members to improve their performance.
Effectively and efficiently able to resolve complex customer inquiries and problems.
Support coaching of Customer Service Representative staff.
Research, evaluate, & recommend external tools for efficiency improvements.
Lead peers in learning and building customer service processes and service excellence skills.
Drive continuous improvements to further skills and customer service best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
